title: Drawing, "Three Studies of Poppies", early 20th century
medium: Brush and gouache on grey paper
signed: Bottom center next to stem in black ink: S.L Crownfield
inscribed: Inscribed top center in black ink: No.4
provenance: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Studies of three poppies on long green stems. Flowers have dark red petals and purple centers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Three Studies of Poppies", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Brush and gouache on grey paper. Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney. 1937-59-59.
